Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『玉座』 国王のみが座る事を許される 聖なる腰かけ。代が変わるごとに 新しいものが作り直される。 古いものは城内で保管されている。 将来的には、王立博物館に特別展示 コーナーが作られる予定。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00>[Royal Throne] A sacred seat made only for the Monarch. A new one is made for each new generation. The old ones are kept in the castle. In the future, the Royal Museum will have a special exhibition section displaying them.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000030>楽になさい。 そして、こちらへ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000030>Be at ease. Now then, come here...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000033>えっ……い、いえ、そんな…… 女王様ほどでは……ないです……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000033>Eh...? N-no, I'm not... Compared to Your Majesty, I'm nothing...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000035>だ、だって……女王様ほど 美しいガジュマの女性を 見た事ないですから……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000035>B-besides... I have never even seen a Gajuma woman as beautiful as you are...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000036>わたくしより美しい ヒューマの女性なら、 見た事があるのかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000036>I wonder, have you seen any Huma women who surpass me in beauty?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000037>そんな……女王様が一番…… お美しいです……

Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000038>...Do you really, truly feel that way?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000039>ええ……本当です。 とても……とても美しいです…… その、美しさだけじゃなく、 気品もあって……とても素敵です……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000039>Yes... I do. You are very, very beautiful... And not just your beauty, but your elegance is remarkable as well...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1800003a>ありがとう、スージー…… こんなわたくしを美しいと 言ってくれて……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1800003A>Thank you, Susie, for calling one such as myself, “beautiful”...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1800003c>そんなに気に入ってくれたなら あなたに……差し上げるわ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1800003C>If you are so taken with it, then I shall bestow it upon you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1800003d>同時に私は意識を失ったみたい…… 気がつくと、遠くから声が聞こえて……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1800003D>At that time, I must have lost consciousness. When I started to come to, I heard voices, as if from far away...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1800003e>……姫様!! 姫様、大丈夫ですか？
<voice:1800003f>なぜ……なぜ受け入れられないの？ 早く、早くしないと……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1800003F>Why... Why will it not accept me? Quickly, we must get this done soon, or...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000040>姫様、きっと見つかります、 ですから、それまでの辛抱です。 きっと間もなく現実のものに……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000040>My Princess, we will certainly find one suitable in time, so please have patience until then. Surely, it shall come to be...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000041>……ジルバ……あなたには 迷惑ばかりかけてしまって…… ごめんなさい……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000041>Zilva... I do nothing but cause you worry. I am sorry...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000042>何をおっしゃいますか、姫様。 それがこのジルバの使命…… 姫様は何も気にする事はありません。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000042>What are you saying, My Princess? My very purpose is to serve you. There is nothing you need be troubled by.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000044>さあ、参りましょう、姫様。 あとの事は私めにお任せください。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000044>Now, shall we go, My Princess? Please leave the rest to me.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00003a>よく来てくれましたね。 あなたの名前は……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D00003A>Here you are at last. What might your name be?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00003b>クレアです。 スールズの生まれです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D00003B>My name is Claire. I'm from the town of Sulz.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00003c>そう……あなたの顔、 そしてその手足…… 美しいわ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D00003C>I see... That face of yours, those hands, those legs... They are exquisite.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00003d>……えっ？ あっ……お誉めくださって ありがとうございます、女王様。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D00003D>...Huh? Um... You honor me with your praise, Your Majesty.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00003e>その美しさがあれば、 どんな相手でもあなたの事を 好いてくれるのでしょうね……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D00003E>With beauty such as yours, anyone would surely fall for you before long...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d000040>あなたほどの美しささえあれば…… 美しい顔……なめらかな肌……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D000040>Ah, with beauty such as yours... That lovely face... that smooth skin...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d000041>……あ、あの……見た目って そんなに大切なものなんでしょうか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D000041>U-um, well... Are appearances really that important?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d000043>あ……すみません…… でも、私……人が人を好きになるのに、 見た目はそんなに大きな事じゃないと 思うんです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D000043>Ah... pardon me! It's just that, when it comes to liking someone, I don't think outward appearance plays a very large role.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d000044>……昔、私の両親が初めて 出会ったのは、真っ暗な洞窟に 迷い込んだ時だったそうです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D000044>...A long time ago, my parents met for the first time while lost inside of a pitch black cave.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d000046>暗闇の中、二人は励まし合いながら、 あきらめずに出口を探し続けました。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D000046>While lost in the darkness, they were able to stay strong and search for a way out thanks to the support they gave each other.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d000047>翌朝、無事に洞窟から出られた時、 初めてお互いの顔を見て、 二人は大笑いしたそうです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D000047>The next morning, after they had safely exited the cave, they saw each others' faces for the first time and burst into laughter.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d000049>か弱くて可憐な娘だと思っていた相手は 泥だらけ、髪もボサボサの村娘。 たくましく頼もしい男性だと思っていた 相手は無精ひげだらけのやせた男。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D000049>The delicate belle that my father had envisioned was a mud-caked village girl with tangled hair; and the gallant, dashing man that my mother had in her mind was a spindly fellow in dire need of a shave.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00004a>二人は、自分たちの想像との 違いに大笑いして、洞窟の中なら 王子様とお姫様でいられたのにねって 顔を見合わせたそうです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D00004A>They were laughing at how their expectations didn't match reality. Inside the cave, they had thought of each other as something like a prince and princess.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00004c>でも、二人は、洞窟を出る前から お互いの事を好きになっていたと 言ってました。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D00004C>But you know, they told me that they had already began to fall for each other before they had even left the cave.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00004d>だから、私は思うんです。 <Yellow>ヒト<White>は姿ではなく、 心を好きになるものだって。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D00004D>So that's what I believe. People don't fall in love with appearances, they fall in love with someone's heart.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00004e>……もし、洞窟を出た時に、 どちらかがガジュマだったとしたら、 それでも、あなたのご両親は 同じ事を言ったかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D00004E>What if when they had exited the cave, one of them was revealed to have been a Gajuma. Do you think that your parents would have told you the same story?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00004f>……言ったと思います。 好きになってしまったら、 ガジュマとかヒューマとか 考える事自体、無意味だと思います。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D00004F>...I believe so, yes. Once you fall for someone, whether they're Gajuma or Huma doesn't matter anymore.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d000050>無意味？ 本気で言ってるの……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D000050>It doesn't matter? Is that how you truly feel...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d000052>嘘よ……本当の事を言いなさい…… ガジュマの身体は醜い…… ヒューマはみんな そう思っているんでしょう？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D000052>You lie. Tell me what you really think! “Gajuma are hideous.” That is what all Huma believe, is it not?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d000054>わたくしには <Cyan>暗闇<White>は無かった……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D000054>There has never been such darkness for me.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d000055>常に行動には監視が付き、 自由に外に出る事も出来ず、 思いどおりに人と会う事もできない……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D000055>I am monitored at all times, I cannot leave the palace freely, and I cannot even meet with people as I please.
<voice:1D000056>Your Majesty, could it be that you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d000058>あなたは、わたくしが 一番欲しいものを 持っているのよ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D000058>You possess the one thing that I desire more than anything!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00005b>姫様…… ご気分はいかがですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D00005B>My Princess, are you feeling all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00005c>とてもいい気分だった…… 今までとは全然違ったわ…… この子が……クレアがわたくしを 救ってくれるんだわ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D00005C>It was a wonderful sensation... Completely different from anything I have experienced before. This girl... Claire, is going to be my salvation...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00005d>もう少しの辛抱でございます。 儀式の日が来れば、姫様の力は……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D00005D>Please be patient for just a while longer. You will need to conserve your strength for the day of the ceremony...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00005e>そうね……儀式が終われば、 すべては終わるのね……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D00005E>Yes... Once the ceremony is finished, all of this will come to an end.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00005f>いいえ、終わりではありません。 儀式を経て、姫様も、わが国も 生まれ変わるのです。 いわば、大いなる始まりなのです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D00005F>No, not an end. After the ceremony, you, and the entire kingdom as well, are going to be reborn. It will be, so to speak, a grand beginning!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d000060>生まれ変わったら…… あの人はわたくしを見てくださるかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D000060>Once I am reborn... I wonder if he will look my way?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d000061>わたくしはあの人と同じ世界を 生きる事ができるのかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D000061>I wonder if I will be able to live in the same world as him...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d000062>案ずる事はありません。 姫様が生まれ変われば、 お二人を隔てていた壁は 跡形もなく消えるのですから。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D000062>There is no need to be anxious about such a thing. Once you are reborn, my princess, all barriers separating the two of you will disappear, leaving behind no trace they were ever there.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000028>……陛下におかれては お変わりもなく、 お喜び申し上げます。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000028>I am delighted to see that you are in good health, Your Majesty.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000029><Eugene>…… あなたは人を殺め、一度は城を追われた身。 陛下に直訴するなど、なんと恐れ多い……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000029><Eugene>... You were banished from this castle on account of murder. For you to make a direct request of Her Majesty is simply disgraceful.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e00002c>わかっている。 だから、俺に任せてくれ。 ……頼む。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E00002C>I know. Just leave this to me, please.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e00002e><Eugene>…… あなたはわたくしの真意を 聞かせてほしいと言いましたね？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E00002E><Eugene>... I believe you spoke of wanting to know my true intentions?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e00002f>はい、単刀直入に申し上げます。 陛下はヒューマの娘を集め、 何をなされるおつもりなのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E00002F>Yes. If you will allow me to get straight to the point... What are you planning to do with the Huma girls you have captured?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000032>……こんな言い伝えがあります。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000032>...There exists a legend that goes as so...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000033>「古の戦に、<Blue>聖なる王<White>は朽ちて、 暗黒の月をこの地に放ちたり。 されど、かの月に赤き光の満ちし時、 王は再び姿を現さん」
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000033>"In the ancient war, the <Blue>Sacred King's<White> life ended in vain, and a Dark Moon was unleashed upon the Earth. Yet, when that moon shall fill with red light, the King shall be revealed once more."

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000034><Blue>聖なる王<White>……月の光？ このお守りと何か関係が……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000034>The <Blue>Sacred King<White>...and the light of the moon? Are those connected to my charm somehow...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000035>その昔…… 不思議な力を持つ<Blue>聖なる王<White>と、 王と同じ力を持つ六人の聖者たちが この世界を治めていました。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000035>Long ago, the <Blue>Sacred King<White> and his six Saints, who all possessed a mysterious power, reigned over this world.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000036>ある時、王と六人の聖者たちは 理想の違いから対立し、やがて それは、世界を巻き込んでの 大いなる戦いへと発展しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000036>Due to their differing ideals, the King and the Saints eventually came into conflict and strayed down a path that enveloped the entire world into a tremendous war.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000037>どちらも国の行く末を案じ、 理想の社会を作ろうとしての対立。 そこには善も悪もありませんでした。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000037>Both were concerned for the future of nations, and fought to establish an ideal society. In that there was no good or evil.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000038>果てしなく続いた戦いの末、 六人の聖者は<Blue>聖なる王<White>を倒し、 この地に封印したのです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000038>After a war that had seemed endless, the Six Saints defeated the <Blue>Sacred King<White> and sealed him within the earth.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000039>わたくしはその封印を解き、 <Blue>聖なる王<White>をよみがえらせる 儀式を執り行うのです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000039>I am going to perform a ritual to release the seal and raise the <Blue>Sacred King<White> from his grave.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e00003a>今こそ、その力がこの国にも、 わたくしにも必要なのです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E00003A>Now more than ever, the kingdom, as well as myself, are in need of his power.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e00003b>我が父、先王ラドラスが 引き起こした能力者の同時覚醒、 バイラスの大量発生による混乱…… 我が国は滅びの道を進みつつあります。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E00003B>The awakening of Force users caused by my late father, King Ladras, and the chaos caused by the mass outbreaks of Viruses... Our kingdom is continuing toward a path of destruction.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e00003c>滅びの道!? そんなヤバイ事が 起こるっていうのかよ!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E00003C>A path of destruction?! Is something that awful really going to happen?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e00003d>……ですから、そうなる前に 手を打たなくてはなりません。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E00003D>...Therefore, I must take action before it is too late.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e00003e><Blue>聖なる王<White>の力が復活したとして、 その力をどう操るというのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E00003E>Supposing you do bring about this <Blue>Sacred King<White>'s power, how do you plan to control it?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000040>王家に連なる者だけが持ち得る<Yellow>月の フォルス<White>に、<Blue>聖なる王<White>の力を合わせれば、 必ず、カレギアを救う事ができる。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000040> If I combine the <Yellow>Force of Moon<White>, which is passed on only through the royal family, with the power of the <Blue>Sacred King<White>, surely Callegea can be saved.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000041>わたくしは、そう信じています。
<voice:1e000042>「暗黒の月」というのが、 陛下のフォルスの事なのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000042>Does the "Dark Moon" refer to Your Majesty's Force?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000043>……これ以上は、王家以外の者が 知る必要はありません。
<voice:1e000044>オレが聞きたいのはそんな話じゃない！ あんたが命じてさらわせた ヒューマの娘たちはどこだ!? クレアは今、どこにいる!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000044>What I want to know has nothing to do with that! Where are the girls you ordered to be kidnapped?! Where is Claire?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000045>ああ……その事ですか…… ……クレア……そう…… あなたは彼女のお友達なのですね。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000045>Ah, so that is why you are here... Claire... Yes... You must be a friend of hers.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000046>そうだ。クレアだ。 儀式とクレアにどんな関係がある？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000046>Yes, Claire! What does she have to do with this ritual?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000047>……光……光のない世界なら 良かったのに。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000047>...Light. If only there were no light in this world.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000048>この世界は……明るすぎるのです。 暗闇など、どこにもありません。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000048>This world is too radiant. There is no darkness to be found.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000049>このまぶしい光の中で生きるために、 彼女はなくてはならないのです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000049>I need her in order to live within the dazzling light.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e00004a>クレアは…… わたくしの希望。
<voice:1e00004c>安心なさい。儀式が終われば、 すぐに彼女はお返しします。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E00004C>Be at ease. When the ritual has been completed, I shall return her to you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e00004d>何があろうとも、彼女は決して 変わる事はありません。 彼女は目を閉じる事ができるから。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E00004D>Regardless of what takes place, she will not change. Because she will still be able to close her eyes.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e00004e>……どういう意味だ!? クレアに何をするつもりだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E00004E>What is that supposed to mean?! What are you planning to do to her?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000051>なんか様子が おかしくないか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000051>Is it me, or is she acting strange?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000052>クレア……あれは…… わたくしのもの……
<voice:1e00005f>取り押さえよ!! 王の間を血で汚すな!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E00005F>Subdue them! Do not defile the throne room with their blood!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1e000063>悪あがきを……！ ええい、捕えよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1E000063>Your resistance is futile! Now, seize them!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3c0000a9>皆さん、 心配をおかけしました。
<voice:3c0000aa>ああ、姫様……！ よくぞご無事で……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3C0000AA>Oh, dear Princess! Thank goodness you're safe!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3c0000ab>長旅の疲れもございましょう、 しばらくは、ご養生なさいませ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3C0000AB>You must be tired after such a long journey. It would be best for you to recuperate for the time being.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3c0000ac>しかし、この状況下で 休むわけには……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3C0000AC>I do not feel as though I should be resting given the current circumstances...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3c0000ae>今、無理をなされて、 姫様のお体に万が一の事があれば、 本当に国が傾いてしまいます。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3C0000AE>The state of the Kingdom will only deteriorate further if anything were to happen to your health. There is no need to overexert yourself.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3c0000af>さぁ、お部屋へ参りましょう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3C0000AF>Now, I shall lead you to your room.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3e00002f>何が起こっているんですか？
<voice:3e000030>……ラジルダが壊滅した。 わかっているのはそれだけだ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3E000030>Catastrophe has befallen Razilda. That is all I know.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3e000031>君は何も心配する事はない。 女王として、ここにいればいい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3E000031>You need not to be concerned. You just need to stay here and play the part of Queen.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3e000033>出動命令が出た。 私はこれから獣王山へ 向かわなくてはならない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3E000033>I have been given orders to advance towards Mount Sovereign.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3e000034>……獣王山にある王家ゆかりの聖所に、 <Veigue>たちが向かっているらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3E000034>Apparently, Veigue's entourage are heading towards the Royal Family's sanctuary within the mountain.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3e000035>私は彼らを止めなくてはならない。 場合によっては……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3E000035>I must stop them. And if it comes down to it, I may have to...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3e000036><Veigue>たちは、 この国を救うために戦ってます！ あなたと戦う理由なんて……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3E000036><Veigue> and his friends are fighting for the sake of the Kingdom! You have no reason to oppose them!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3e000037>この国を守るのは我々だ。 得体の知れぬ者が、その秩序を 乱すとなればなおさら。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3E000037>The duty to protect this nation falls on us alone. We must remain ever more vigilant in the event that suspicious individuals attempt to disrupt this order.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3e000039>将軍。 出発の準備が整いました。
<voice:3e00003b>それでは、<Red>陛下<White> 行ってまいります。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3E00003B>Well then, <Red>Your Majesty<White>, I shall take my leave.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3e00003d><Veigue>…… 私にも何かできる事はないの……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3E00003D><Veigue>... Is there really nothing I can do to help?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
